headline: Alliant Energy Names Patrick Allen as Independent Board Chair
summary: MADISON, Wis., March 10, 2025--Alliant Energy Corporation (NASDAQ: LNT) today announced Patrick Allen has been named by the Board of Directors as incoming Independent Board Chair. This change becomes effective after the Company’s Annual Meeting of Shareowners currently planned for May 2025.
